author: JoVita Goldsby
text: When it’s over it’s over some things aren’t worth saving especially at the sacrifice of your own peace of mind and happiness

author: JoVita Goldsby
text: I love watching the night sky illuminate my mind with lightening strikes followed by the heartbeat of thunder

author: JoVita Goldsby
text: To think I searched for you like lost treasure only to find fools gold

author: JoVita Goldsby
text: When you go through darkness you come out shining pressure creates beautiful diamonds

author: JoVita Goldsby
text: The joy of me is missing searching through the thick vines of my heart to find that spark that used to be for poetry.

author: JoVita Goldsby
text: I miss writing and performing poetry it was like therapy
